Synatiq.com – Low End Talk Offer Highlight – $20 Free Credit, London & LA NVMe based VPS from $5/m

kvm, london, los angeles, nvme, synatiq March 20, 2020 @ 4:24 am, by Jon Biloh

Synatiq posted a really great offer recently on Low End Talk which we wanted to highlight on Low End Box to make sure it’s not missed by anyone.

Available in their London and Los Angeles locations is a $20 USD credit with no expiry, applicable after the first transaction or balance deposit with voucher code “JOIN10”. Lowest transaction acceptable is $5, and then the $20 can be redeemed.
Once registered, redeem voucher code JOIN10 from Billing – Add funds, after one successful transaction (from as little as $5). The free credits are not time limited and they won’t expire until used. Voucher is subject to discontinuation for new signups at any time.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PCredit Cards, PayPal, BitCoin and UK Bank Transfers as payment methods.

Some features Synatiq is proud of:

  • Free Plesk 10 domain license on 2GB RAM and above
  • 10Gbps down/up on all plans
  • NVMe storage
  • Free weekly backups and snapshots
  • Linux and Windows at not extra cost
  • DDoS protected
  • Flexible billing options designed for developers

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Synatiq is a UK company offering seriously fast, highly reliable, secure and instant Linux and Windows Cloud Servers (VPS). Based on pure-NVMe storage, 10 GBPS by default, DDoS protection, instant setup and free weekly backups.”

Here’s the offers: 

Package 1

  • 1024MB RAM
  • 1x vCPU
  • 25GB SSD space
  • 1000GB transfer
  • 10Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM
  • Los Angeles and Loson
  • $5/month
  • [ORDER]

Plenty of other, larger packages (beyond 1 GB ram) are available on their website at a higher price.

Their prior offer on Low End Box was met with positive feedback. If you are a customer or purchase now please share your feedback.

More information after the break including benchmarks, speed tests, etc!

How does it perform?
– London https://www.speedtest.net/result/c/ab3dbf83-4f30-4fcb-b68a-8a124d3f0a67
– Los Angeles https://www.speedtest.net/result/c/1b035862-8a86-4038-8eef-f4b12f5dd877
